item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:170 Chances: Oracle has been recognized as a Leader in the cloud database management systems and has introduced new capabilities to Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Performance Management, indicating potential for growth and innovation. Institutions’ substantial holdings in Oracle imply significant influence over the stock’s performance and direction.
